docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, Argentina, May 26 -- The Inter-American Conference on Coordination of Police and Judicial Measures, called to discuss precautions against foreign threats, will meet here tomorrow morning. All American States will be represented.

docs.snippet: WEEK ENDED MAY 29, 1942 A sharp rise in the so-called free Canadian dollar stood out as the most significant development of the trading in the foreign exchange market last week.

docs.snippet: Civilian heroes, the Russian guerrillas, are to be pictured on a 30-kopecs deep blue stamp "in honor of the mass joining of Soviet people in the volunteer armies fighting to protect the Fatherland against the bloody Fascist," according to word...
docs.lead_paragraph: Civilian heroes, the Russian guerrillas, are to be pictured on a 30-kopecs deep blue stamp "in honor of the mass joining of Soviet people in the volunteer armies fighting to protect the Fatherland against the bloody Fascist," according to word received from the Soviet postal authorities by J. H. Stolow last week.

docs.snippet: An interesting stampless cover now in a collection here, first mailed in Italy, is addressed to a prisoner of war in Egypt. Instead of going directly to its destination, it was routed, correctly, to headquarters of the International Red Cross at...
docs.lead_paragraph: An interesting stampless cover now in a collection here, first mailed in Italy, is addressed to a prisoner of war in Egypt. Instead of going directly to its destination, it was routed, correctly, to headquarters of the International Red Cross at Geneva, Switzerland.
